title: Sync errors after network disruption
body:
### Description
Reported by `bwt1` on ConsenSys Discord, running Teku 20.11.1.

Hi, I've suffered an extended (~1 hour) local Internet outage. When the network came back, Teku seemed to be struggling to get going again. I got a lot of repeated errors as follows:
```2021-01-06 04:15:22.764+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | PeerSync | Failed to import block from peer (err: FAILED_STATE_TRANSITION)
2021-01-06 04:15:23.452+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | ESC[37mSync Event  *** Current slot: 256875, Head slot: 256703, Connected peers: 73ESC[0m
2021-01-06 04:15:29.522+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | BlockProcessorUtil | process_block_header: Verify that proposer index is the correct index
2021-01-06 04:15:29.522+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | StateTransition | State Transition error
```
I restarted the client and it looks like I'm back in business pretty quickly.


Looking at the logs there's a long period where Teku is processing empty slots because it has no peers.  When the network is restored it finds peers again and switches to sync mode, successfully imports some blocks then gets stuck on one that that it appears to calculate the wrong expected proposer index for (its definitely the correct block - hash and proposer index matches what's actually on the chain):

```
2021-01-06 03:47:39.480+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256736, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:47:51.443+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256737, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:48:03.467+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256738, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:48:15.456+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256739, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:48:27.451+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256740, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:48:39.453+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256741, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:48:51.449+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256742, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:49:03.453+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256743, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:49:15.463+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Slot Event  *** Slot: 256744, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 8023, Finalized checkpoint: 8010, Finalized root: e5b5ed..a4bf, Peers: 0
2021-01-06 03:49:24.962+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Sync Event  *** Current slot: 256745, Head slot: 256406, Connected peers: 4
2021-01-06 03:49:35.573+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | INFO  | ForkChoice | Skipping head block update as justified checkpoint was updated while loading checkpoint state. Was 8015 (0x45590ff5e6899c3d61bec1bdc216acb64d5b592bb7f80687ea6ef1cc36b0e1bb) but now 8016 (0x5bf42cbf9a9faff37b96fc2cee30d2af295a5763d9b8619dd804157fdad99686)
2021-01-06 03:49:35.573+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | Sync Event  *** Current slot: 256746, Head slot: 256544, Connected peers: 5
2021-01-06 03:49:37.634+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | BlockProcessorUtil | process_block_header: Verify that proposer index is the correct index
2021-01-06 03:49:37.634+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | StateTransition | State Transition error
tech.pegasys.teku.core.exceptions.BlockProcessingException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: process_block_header: Verify that proposer index is the correct index
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProcessorUtil.process_block_header(BlockProcessorUtil.java:119) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.lambda$process_block$2(StateTransition.java:142) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.state.BeaconStateImpl.updated(BeaconStateImpl.java:247) ~[teku-ethereum-datastructures-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.process_block(StateTransition.java:140) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.initiate(StateTransition.java:110) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.ForkChoiceUtil.on_block(ForkChoiceUtil.java:247) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]

        at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.SingleThreadedForkChoiceExecutor.lambda$performTask$0(SingleThreadedForkChoiceExecutor.java:58) ~[teku-ethereum-statetransition-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1130) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:630) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:832) [?:?]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: process_block_header: Verify that proposer index is the correct index
        at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:142) ~[guava-29.0-jre.jar:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProcessorUtil.process_block_header(BlockProcessorUtil.java:93) ~[teku-ethereum-core-20.11.1.jar:20.11.1]
        ... 13 more
2021-01-06 03:49:37.641+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | PeerSync | Failed to import block from peer (err: FAILED_STATE_TRANSITION) SignedBeaconBlock{message=BeaconBlock{root=0xae13029bf0bf5a269bbbce6c82aec597494d5eec62ce952b6a208a2bad38ada3, slot=256576, proposer_index=35233, parent_root=0xb1a4c5a068dbe3ec14d583c2982f290efe110184fc5da9cd24f8e7d03cf547f1, state_root=0xdb9f0ec63e4ab2120839db6435311d56f5a74fc0e4b4c31a7161af1b34576f04, body=0x55c1b6d204e4d1ebb4055c71351d2f6886e8
8f698e738f176377ccd3f97b487c}, signature=0xaf9afacc3e378a2420d422a804af6f1b623bc206c719d85d03908570d51b036d95e0c447b7a4800ef133a34ef9e95aaa07ce994d3f1ef9e53c5ec587e07e0e7790ff82464f813e86c1025dc9430f030cab2f96ebe3239213e5f4f945534cdc59}: DefaultEth2Peer{id=16Uiu2HAmCJ3AQcPC8rA5rT4dfMRQHMq7WCB37qLCyQHDNuMP448J, remoteStatus=Optional[PeerStatus{forkDigest=0xb5303f2a, finalizedRoot=0x4c0ecb59c6f03614f0d6b5c8a54147513ebe8497fb536edb9d6c6dd7df845efd, finalizedEpoch=8021, headRoo
t=0x89f21fe9d8ae24d34dcb76b1cb780e49c42be368010fdc59ac85b9c4bef08000, headSlot=256744}]}
```


Interestingly, it eventually disconnects all its peers for sending this bad block (expected) and when it gets new peers again, starts making progress for a little while again before hitting the same issue with a different block:

```
2021-01-06 03:57:38.011+00:00 | forkchoice-0 | WARN  | PeerSync | Failed to import block from peer (err: FAILED_STATE_TRANSITION) SignedBeaconBlock{message=BeaconBlock{root=0xae13029bf0bf5a269bbbce6c82aec597494d5eec62ce952b6a208a2bad38ada3, slot=256576, proposer_index=35233, parent_root=0xb1a4c5a068dbe3ec14d583c2982f290efe110184fc5da9cd24f8e7d03cf547f1, state_root=0xdb9f0ec63e4ab2120839db6435311d56f5a74fc0e4b4c31a7161af1b34576f04, body=0x55c1b6d204e4d1ebb4055c71351d2f6886e8

t=0x0fa62507760e3c10eb49eb7a489eca6081b23fa00be7cfde0c5379b9688d1ebe, headSlot=256785}]}
```
